text: Dr Dinesh and his team were absolutely wonderful. They were professional, compassionate, and committed to getting me a diagnosis and helping me feel better. I'm very grateful to Heart Matters and would recommend them wholeheartedly. (Pun intended. ðŸ¤­)

Dr Dinesh is an excellent doctor and educator. Explaining medical jargons in simple terms. He exudes great care and understanding to every patient he consults. I am definitely in good hands. Thanks doctor.

I was scared to visit a cardiologist, as normally many tests are recommended but Dr Dinesh was very nice, and he understood our case, and recommended a very genuine approach. Clearly it wasnt about making money like most doctors here. Thankful to him.

An excellent clinician and a thorough professional! Very knowledgeable and gives the best advice.
Has an excellent team of nurses and cou ter staff who are very pleasant and always eager to help.
Dr Dinesh and his team, especially Mee Siew, are amazing. He is very patient, always willing to listen and will give the best advice.
